General.Name: Acme Electronics
General.Description: Acme Electronics Corporation produces and sells soft ferrite products in Taiwan. The company primarily offers Mn-Zn ferrite cores, Ni-Zn ferrite cores, and Mg-Zn ferrite cores for use in telecommunication, power conversion, and interference suppression applications. Its soft ferrite products comprise inductance passive electronic components, such as power transformers, loaded coils, and choke and demagnetization coils, which are used in various 3C devices, including power supplies, desktop monitors, notebooks, broadband network systems, telephone switching systems, relay stations, mobile phones, PDAs, LCD TVs, digital cameras, digital video cameras, video games handsets, scanners, etc. The company also provides sapphire ingots to sapphire wafer customers. Acme Electronics Corporation was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
